author: chay_z123
content:
With Sepolia facing issues, attention has quickly moved there for good reasons. With that said, many of us are operating businesses and rely on Holesky for critical day to day development. 

The updates have become sparse and all over the place, making it hard to understand what is theory and what is reality. I am curious what the latest thinking of Holesky and how those of us running RPC nodes can get nodes back in a decent place. <@552133098075193354> , not sure who else to tag.

author: parithosh
content: apologies for the delay, we would be giving a proper update after ACD tomorrow and can do a better job of presenting the current status in the meantime

content: not going down is a big part of what makes ethereum valuable

author: chay_z123

content: Obviously we'll reasses this, figure out a proper testing plan, and only then schedule Pectra.
